column1: With that figure you get a small sheet that tells you how to put the tassel on the sword... btw who needs that?!? The rest of this side of the sheet is covered with a picture of Lloyd dressed in his ninja-suit in action doing a kick and the well known #BENINJA. So to say a nice micro-poster from the main character of the film. The other side features another micro-poster of the movie, with all the heroes in front and in the background the city of Ninjago threatened by a very large, grim looking Garmadon.
